impactDescription:
We amplified the most important artists and albums on Optimism via our newsletter, Mirror & X posts.

We drove mints, volume, and users.

We educated the community about the Optimism Collective and helped position it as a forefront player in music.

We encouraged artists to mint their music and receive retroactive funding for their contributions to Optimism.  

Through our Mirror, we drove hundreds of mints to Optimism. We have 12K subscribers and 2.3K Invest in Music pass holders. 

Optimism Onchain Curator Program

We drove 370 mints, 0.67 ETH volume, and onboarded five artists, creating great content every step of the way.

Partnerships

We work closely with projects such as Mirror, First Mate, Spinamp, and Collect Pods, who prioritized their Optimism integration at our request.
contributionDescription:
Invest in Music championed the development of Optimism since its launch on Sound.xyz, in June.
 
We onboarded our audience to the Optimism Collective through our newsletter, podcast, and posts on X. 

Our blog posts and podcasts were collected on Optimism via Mirror and Spinamp. 

We’re the only media outlet in onchain music that created Optimism content consistently. 

We helped artists navigate the L2 space, guiding them through the grant and retro applications.

Invest in Music is one of the top drivers of mints to music on Optimism - we referred more than 200 mints across 76 unique songs.

We’re the 4th largest curator on Sound.xyz

We launched an Optimism Onchain Curator program - giving our community 1000 OP per month for driving mints, volume, artists, and content on Optimism.
